msg.payload.results.map(r => rules.push(r.rule))
console.log("Parameter file Rules pub Topic: filerules", rules)

name: Prep for DB Rules Dropdown Topic:dbruletypes
func:
let ret = []
msg.payload.map(t => ret.push({ [t.type + '(' + t.cnt +')']: t.type}))
msg.options = ret
msg.payload = ret

return msg;

name: Rule Types Drop Down Topic: dbreportingids

name: Prep for RID Dropdown Topic:dbreportingids
func:
let ret = []
 msg.payload.map(t => ret.push({ [t.shortvalue + " "+ t.reporting_id]: t.reporting_id}))
msg.options = ret
msg.payload = ret
msg.topic = "dbreportingids"
return msg;

name: Send to log the output of the results
func:
let messages = []

let P = msg.payload
P.rules.valid.map(p=> messages.push({ruleId: p.id, message: p.message}))


msg.payload = {
    "Workflow ID": msg.payload.workflowId,
    "Rules Passed": msg.payload.rules.valid.length,

    "Rules Failed": msg.payload.rules.invalid.length,
    messages

}
msg.topic = "QBES Output"
return msg;

props.v: What is the name, condition, compute as an array and message of the following rule and return it as a json:    Naveen:   I was talking to Patrick and he wanted another    rule name is "IF the flag for hazardas materials is reported  and the NAICS is in 484". It should have a rule priority of 5 on a scale of 1 to 10.   and condition is   substr(RECORD_NAICS_NUM, 1,3)== 484 and RCPT_MOTR_HAZRD_STAT == 1 and RCPT_MOTR_HAZRD_PCT == 0 if true then compute  RCPT_MOTR_HAZRD_STAT = 2  Send the message "Hazardous Material rule fired".  Do you think we could chat on this soon?  Thanks Amit

name: Get Rules
payload: select id, name, description, active, type, rvs,    parsed_rule->>'event' as event ,   parsed_rule->>'conditions' as conditions,   (parsed_rule)::TEXT parsed_rule, data   from aies.rules_repository

name: Assigning rid in msg
web-template
search-query
insert-query
func:
msg.topic="INSERT INTO test (name,lastname,code,married,timestamp) VALUES ('" + msg.payload.name + "','" + msg.payload.lastname + "','" + msg.payload.code + "','" + msg.payload.married + "',CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)";
return msg;

name: lastname-query
func:
msg.topic="SELECT id, lastname as value FROM lastname";
return msg;

name: delete-query
func:
msg.topic="DELETE FROM test WHERE id='" + msg.payload.id + "'";
return msg;

name: update-query
func:
msg.topic="UPDATE test SET name='" + msg.payload.name + "', lastname='" + msg.payload.lastname + "', code='" + msg.payload.code + "', married='" + msg.payload.married + "' WHERE id='" + msg.payload.id + "'";
return msg;
